name: Go Go Ball 3D
description: It is nice 3D Infinite Ball Game , in which player needs to route the ball in provided paths without falling down so that he can collect more diamonds. In case if the ball falls down , then the game will be over. At this situation if player has Lives then he can continue playing from the same position where he felt down otherwise he needs to play from starting point.And also player can use magnetic power and speedup power to collect more diamonds and reach more levels respectively.
